entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow over southern sections in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
